sentences.en: 'Truly, a decree for selling the property of emigrants.'
sentences.cn: “ 有那么回事, 是出售外逃人员财产的法令. ”

sentences.en: 'What is this decree that the smith spoke of?'
An official decree invalidated the vote in the capital.
sentences.cn: 一份官方法令宣布在首都举行的投票无效。

sentences.en: He backed a provision that would allow judges to delay granting a divorce decree in some cases.
sentences.cn: 他赞成一项允许法官在一些情况下延迟作出离婚判决的法律条款。

sentences.en: In July he issued a decree ordering all unofficial armed groups in the country to disband.
sentences.cn: 他于7月份下令解散国内所有的非正式武装组织。

sentences.en: The 1977 amendments essentially codified this consent decree.
sentences.cn: 1977年的修正案实质上把双方同意的判决编入了法典.

sentences.en: The court granted her a decree of divorce.
The decree put the president in an uncomfortable position.
sentences.cn: 这一判决使总统陷入了尴尬的处境中。

sentences.en: The Emperor issued the decree repealing martial law.
sentences.cn: 皇帝下诏令取消了军事管制。

sentences.en: The government decreed that all who wanted to live and work in Kenya must hold Kenyan passports.
sentences.cn: 政府下令要求所有想在肯尼亚居住和工作的人必须持有肯尼亚护照。

sentences.en: The parliament described the decree as interference in the republic's internal affairs.
sentences.cn: 议会形容此法令为对共和国内政的干涉。

sentences.en: The period between the decree nisi and the decree absolute was six weeks.
sentences.cn: 离婚判决令和最终判决之间的期限当时为六个星期。

sentences.en: The President has so far refused to countersign the Prime Minister's desperate decree.
sentences.cn: 总统到目前为止仍然拒绝在首相那条孤注一掷的政令上连署签字。

sentences.en: They had to obey the decree that beards be shaved off.
sentences.cn: 他们只得服从剃光胡须的法令.

sentences.en: This last clause is a thinly-veiled threat to those who might choose to ignore the decree.
sentences.cn: 这最后一项条款明显是对那些可能会无视法令之人的威慑。

sentences.en: This mode of address was now prescribed by decree.
sentences.cn: 这在那时是法定的招呼形式.

sentences.en: We assembled here today are issuing a new decree to be heardin every city, in every foreign capital, and in every hall of power.
sentences.cn: 今天我们聚集于此，是为了颁布新的命令，让它在每座城市、每个国家的首都、每座权力的殿堂回响。

trans.tran_en: an official order or decision, especially one made by the ruler of a country
to make an official judgment or give an official order
an official order or decision, especially one made by the ruler of a country
to make an official judgment or give an official order
